tooltip.heart_container.1: Increases maximum health by %s, up to %s times.
tooltip.stamina_vessel.1: Increases maximum stamina by %s, up to %s times.
tooltip.horned_statue.1: Retrieves all Heart Containers and Stamina Vessels you consumed.
tooltip.horned_statue.2: SPECIAL PRICE! No rupees required! Also adorable as heck.
